sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_pointsthing_message"> <x_snc_pointsthing_message action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <message><![CDATA['Let him who hath understanding reckon the number of the beast. ' + user + ' has scored a point, and its number is six hundred and sixty six (total) :the_horns:']]></message> <point>666</point> <send_to_channel>true</send_to_channel> <sys_created_by>earl.duque</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-10-14 03:36:58</sys_created_on> <sys_id>025c6dd1dbe2d150791d8f8d13961934</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>earl.duque</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-10-14 03:39:16</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_pointsthing_message> </record_update>
